fields.fieldDescription: The Record ID (RID) uniquely identifying this customer personnel record.
The Record ID (RID) for the customer.
"The User ID identifying the user assigned to this customer.  (First and last names for this user appear as ""Personnel Name"")."
Indicates whether or not this personnel assignment is a default assignment for this customer.
The date when this customer personnel assignment was made.
"If access to this customer is restricted, indicates whether or not this user is an access manager for the restricted customer."
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
